long_description: Designed for 4-season backpacking, the Brooks-Range Propel 2D mountaineering tent gives you the option of using your ski or trekking poles to save weight when you're traveling light. Tent includes 4 DAC aluminum poles and 1 spine pole; leave them at home and use with ski/trekking poles and avalanche probe for minimalist adventures. Polyurethane-coated nylon walls and floor provide water- and wind-resistance; mesh vents with mini-flys help prevent condensation buildup. 2-person, freestanding tent has 2 doors with 2 full vestibules for separate entrances and storage areas. Please note: tent does not feature a rainfly or guylines. Minimum trail weight of 2 lbs. 5 oz. does NOT include poles; poles add 1 lb. Closeout.
short_description: Designed for 4-season backpacking, the Brooks-Range Propel 2D mountaineering tent gives you the option of using your ski or trekking poles to save weight when you're traveling light.
